404.title: Ba a samo shafi ba
404.doesNotExist: Yi haƙuri, shafin da kuke nema babu shi.
404.errorLogged: Mun shiga cikin kuskure kuma za mu bincika.

translate.title: Fassarar Alamar

human-pose-viewer.loading: Ana loda samfurin bidiyo na ɗan adam

translate.description: Fassarar Harshen Alamu mara Ƙoƙari tare da Samfuran Yanke-Edge na Gaskiya.

hero.title: Fassara tsakanin 40+ sa hannu da harsunan magana a ainihin-lokaci.
hero.img: Misalin fassarar kai tsaye tsakanin Harshen Alamun Amurka da Ingilishi

direction.spoken-to-signed: Fassara daga magana zuwa harsunan sa hannu
direction.signed-to-spoken: Ko daga sa hannu zuwa harsunan magana

real-time.title: Fassara na Gaskiya
real-time.subtitle: Fassara tsakanin 40+ sa hannu da harsunan magana a ainihin-lokaci
real-time.description: Aikace-aikacen mu yana ba ku damar sadarwa ta dabi'a da sauƙi tare da kowa, a ko'ina, kowane lokaci, cikin yaren ku.

multilingual.title: Tallafin harsuna da yawa
multilingual.subtitle: Fassara tsakanin harsunan alamar alama daban-daban da harsunan magana
multilingual.description: App ɗin mu yana tallafawa yarukan alamomi da yawa da yaren magana, don haka zaku iya sadarwa tare da mutane daga ƙasashe da al'adu daban-daban.

appearance.title: Bayyanar da za a iya daidaitawa
appearance.subtitle: Hoton mu na haƙiƙanin avatar yaren alamar yana ba da zaɓuɓɓukan gyare-gyare da yawa don dacewa da takamaiman bukatunku.
appearance.description: Ko kuna son ƙirƙirar avatar mai kama da ku ko ƙirƙirar hali na musamman, zaɓin gyare-gyaren mu yana ba ku damar bayyana kanku ta hanyar da ta dace da ku.

open-source.title: Buɗe Source Project
open-source.subtitle: Sign Translate shiri ne na buɗe ido, yana bawa al'umma damar ba da gudummawa da haɓaka abubuwanta.
open-source.description: Ta hanyar raba lambar tushe, muna nufin haɓaka haɗin gwiwa da bayyana gaskiya.

offline.title: Ayyukan Wajen Layi
offline.subtitle: Sa hannu Translate aiki a ko'ina, ko da offline a kan jirgin sama.
offline.description: Ko kuna tafiya, a cikin yanki mai nisa, ko kuma ba tare da intanet ba, app ɗinmu yana tabbatar da cewa koyaushe kuna iya fassara yaren magana ko rubuce-rubuce zuwa yaren kurame, kiyaye mahimman kayan aikin sadarwa a hannunku.

text-to-speech.unavailable: Babu fitarwar murya don harshen da aka zaɓa

speech-to-text.not-allowed: Bukatar izini don amfani da makirufo
speech-to-text.language-not-supported: Ba a tallafawa harshen da aka zaɓa
speech-to-text.browser-not-supported: Ba a tallafawa shigar da murya akan wannan mai binciken
speech-to-text.service-not-allowed: Bukatar izini don amfani da tantance magana
